PathOfBuilding.Notes:
LEVELING NOTES:
IF YOU DON'T KNOW WHERE OR WHEN TO BUY THE GEMS, YOU CAN FIND A LIST AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE.
YOU CAN SWAP TO THE BLAZING SALVO SETUP (UNDER Skills & Items) AS SOON AS YOU HAVE TREMOR ROD
ONCE YOU HIT MAPS, YOU WILL WANT TO UPGRADE YOUR WANDS, SOMETHING LIKE THIS:
https://www.pathofexile.com/trade/search/Ritual/DYzVMLdf5
The rest of your gear is legit just Life & Resistances. Check out under "Items"
!!!IMPORTANT!!!
Under "Items" there's is Malachai's Artifice Unique Ring. DO NOT USE THIS WITH HERALD OF THUNDER!!!
Once you Swap to Blazing Salvo, you will want NO SOURCE OF ADDITIONAL FIRE DAMAGE TO SPELLS ANYWHERE ON YOUR BUILD.
Act 1:
Stormblast Mines (lvl 1) + Swift Assembly (lvl 4) - BG Frostblink (lvl 4) -> Flame Dash (lvl 10) + Arcane Surge (lvl 4 - DO NOT LEVEL THIS) - BB Orb of Storms (lvl 4) + Added Lightning Damage (lvl 8) - BB Frostbomb (lvl 4) + Onslaught (lvl 4) - BG Smoke Mine (lvl 10) - G
Act 2: Stormblast Mines + Swift Assembly + Added Lightning Damage - BBG Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (DO NOT LEVEL THIS) - BB Frostbomb + Onslaught - BG Orb of Storms + Elemental Focus (lvl 18) - BB Herald of Thunder (lvl 16) - B Skitterbots (lvl 16) - B Wave of Conviction - B Smoke Mine - G
------BANDIT-----
Help Alira
----- IMPORTANT---- Wand Craft Recipe - DO NOT DO THIS BEFORE YOU ARE LEVEL 20!!! 1 Magic Wand 1 Orb of Alteration 1 RARE Topaz Ring
YOU WILL WANT TWO OF THESE, THEY WILL CARRY YOU ALL THE WAY TO MAPS.
Act 3: Stormblast Mines + Swift Assembly + Added Lightning Damage - BBG Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (DO NOT LEVEL THIS) - BB Orb of Storms + Onslaught + Elemental Focus - BBG Herald of Thunder (lvl 16) - B Skitterbots (lvl 16) - B Wave of Conviction - B Smoke Mine - G Conductivity - B
Act 4: (When you get to Crystal Veins and do NORMAL LAB) Arc - Blastchain Mines - Elemental Focus - Swift Assembly (if you have a 4L) - BBBG Flame Dash + Arcane Surge (DO NOT LEVEL THIS) - BB Herald of Thunder (lvl 16) - B Skitterbots (lvl 16) - B Wave of Conviction - B Smoke Mine - G Conductivity - B
Act 6: Everything Stays the Same except the following: Wave of Conviction + Conductivity + Hextouch Support - BBB
Act 7-10: Nothing Changes
*** AFTER HILLOCK *** Nessa: Look for BBG, BB or BG Wands
Tarkleigh: Stormblast Mines Look for Movement Speed, BBG, BB or BG Gloves / Helmet / Boots
*** AFTER HAILRAKE *** Nessa: Quicksilver Flask & Swift Assembly BUY: Frostbomb, Onslaught, Arcane Surge Look for BBG, BB or BG Wands (if you don't have yet)
Tarkleigh: Orb of Storms & Frostblink Look for Movement Speed, BBG, BB or BG Gloves / Helmet / Boots
*** BEFORE BRUTUS *** Nessa: Added Lightning Damage
*** AFTER BRUTUS *** Nessa: Buy Smoke Mine
Tarkleigh: Flame Dash
*** AFTER THE DEN **** Yeena: 2nd Quicksilver Flask
*** AFTER CHAMBER OF SINS *** Greust: Herald of Thunder
Yeena: Buy Skitterbots
*** AFTER WEAVER *** Silk: Elemental Focus
Yeena: Buy Wave of Convicton
*** AFTER CREMATORIUM *** Maramoa: Conductivity
*** AFTER NORMAL LAB *** Act 1:
Nessa: Buy Arc & Blastchain Mines
*** AFTER ORIATH SQUARE (Act 5) *** Lani: Silver Flask
*** AFTER TWILIGHT STRAND (Act 6) *** Lilly: Buy Hextouch Support
*** AFTER WEYLAM'S LOCKET (Act 7) Weylam: Diamond Flask
